content: Has anyone experienced the "Syntax error at define" in the MAT. I made sure all definitions and functions are successfully validated with no error but then when I click on CQL Library Editor, I got that error randomly on definitions and functions. Your response is appreciated.

Hi @Tien Thai , I have heard recently of a packaging error with the MAT when using functions with Tuple arguments. Not sure if that is the case here or not, but I'd suggest following up with the MAT team directly. I don't think many MAT experts frequent this thread :)
